snippet: Media stocks had some of the biggest losses in midday trading as investors worried about fading revenue from cable television.
abstract: Markets end lower following steep decline in media stocks, as investors worry about fading revenue from cable television.
lead_paragraph: Media stocks had some of the biggest losses in midday trading as investors worried about fading revenue from cable television.

headline.main: Wall St. Slips Lower, Led by Declines in Media Shares
headline.print_headline: Media Company Shares Drag the Markets Lower
